Class LimitedVisibility

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.entity.LimitedVisibility
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hologram, HumanNPC
public abstract class LimitedVisibility extends Object
A visibility limiter for entities.
